data.prayer: Father, may the churches in California, United States honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of California, United States

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in California, United States to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 3 lost neighbors

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to California, United States.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 10,413,998 believers in California against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.
Jesus, I pray that all the Cham, Western people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Cham, Western people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Cham, Western people is yours.
Pour your Spirit out on the 39,437,700 citizens of California, United States, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in California, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of California unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
